name: Power Drive 2000 (Pre-Alpha Demo)
description:
Power Drive 2000 is not just a racing game, it's an action game with a car...that talks. The game is set in a 1980's style sci-fi world with an eclectic mix of environments and a variety of unique gameplay modes.

More info about the game can be found on the Kickstarter page: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1420158244/power-drive-2000
